function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Climate change leading to increased pest populations and impact on agricultural productivity","Impact":"Decreased agricultural productivity and livelihoods at risk","Mitigation":"Adopting climate-resilient agricultural practices, implementing pest management strategies","Technologies":"Climate-resilient agricultural technologies, pest control technologies","People":"Farmers, agricultural workers","Owner":"Government, agricultural organizations"},{"Description":"Energy systems vulnerable to high temperatures and increased demand","Impact":"Strains on energy supply and transmission, potential blackouts or energy shortage","Mitigation":"Investing in resilient energy infrastructure, promoting energy efficiency and conservation","Technologies":"Renewable energy sources, energy storage systems, smart grid technologies","People":"Utility companies, energy providers","Owner":"Government, energy regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Correlation between temperature and interpersonal violence","Impact":"Rise in interpersonal violence including overt violence, criminal acts, and low-level aggression","Mitigation":"Implementing community-based violence prevention programs, improving access to mental health services, promoting conflict resolution skills","Technologies":"Community safety technologies, mental health support technologies","People":"Local communities, law enforcement agencies","Owner":"Local government, community organizations"}]}
